attributes.review: So I was researching as to the policies of each candidate for the upcoming election and saw that trump had an app, so i downloaded it. I signed up for the text messages alerts and he kept asking for money saying that he would triple my donation and I even got messages from “Don Jr” saying his father wants to meet me. All very manipulative and very wrong. Trump also wants to ban free speech and is starting to sound like a fascist. so i will be leaving this horrible review on this app.

attributes.review:
I’ll never download this app again! Its so horribly made, it should be banned! Why would someone put out such a horrible app?? Please remove this so nobody else has to experience what I did 😭😭😭😭😭

Anyways heres a Cheetos Chicken Recipe

Ingredients:
• 3 Cups Crunchy Cheetos
• 1/3 Cup Parmesan Cheese, Grated
• 1/4 Cup Flour
• 1/2 Teaspoon Salt
• 1 Egg
• 1 Tablespoon Water
• 2 Boneless Skinless Chicken Breast

Directions:
• Place the Cheetos in your food processor and process into small crumbs. Add the Parmesan Cheese and pour onto a plate.
• Coat chicken breasts in flour & salt.
• Combine egg & water. Beat until well combined. Dip floured Chicken in egg mixture.
• Coat the chicken in the Cheeto crumbs.
• Place on a lightly greased baking sheet.
•  Bake for 35-45 minutes at 350° until chicken is cooked through, cooking time will depend on thickness of meat.
attributes.title: Worst App EVER 😖😖😖😖😖
